title: Banana souffle
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon unsalted butter, melted', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '2 egg whites', '2 eggs, separated', '1 pinch salt', '2 ripe bananas, mashed', '1 tablespoon honey, or more to taste', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon grated fresh root ginger', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder']
